problem.markdown:
1. The maximum numbers of states that a counter with six flip-flops can count are () 6 () 8 (x) 64 () 256
2) The maximum numbers of flip-flops required for a mod 10 ripple counter are () 2 (x) 4 () 6 () 10
3) The number of states in decade counter is () 5 (x) 10 () 15 () 20
4) Flip-flop is used to store () two bits information (x) one bit information () one byte of information () none of the above
5) Any sequential circuit that goes through a prescribed sequence of states up to application of input pulses is called as (x) counter () a and b () flip-flop () register
problem.p: 1. The maximum numbers of states that a counter with six flip-flops can count are

3) The number of states in decade counter is
